snippet: Italy’s president pardoned a United States Air Force colonel convicted in absentia for the abduction of an Egyptian terrorism suspect in Milan in a Central Intelligence Agency operation.
abstract: Italy’s Pres Giorgio Napolitano pardons Col Joseph L Romano, United States Air Force colonel convicted in absentia for 2009 abduction of Egyptian terrorism suspect in Milan in Central Intelligence Agency operation.
lead_paragraph: Italy’s president pardoned a United States Air Force colonel convicted in absentia for the abduction of an Egyptian terrorism suspect in Milan in a Central Intelligence Agency operation.

headline.seo: Italy’s President Grants Pardon in Rendition Case
headline.main: Italy: Pardon Granted in Rendition Case
headline.print_headline: Italy: Pardon Granted in Rendition Case
